Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.

4. Student discussed planning fun activities with their grandkids for retirement, and Teacher wished them well in retirement and spending time with family.

Teacher: Your proactive nature and willingness to learn will take you far, Student. I'm glad to see you expanding your horizons with language studies. Keep up the great work!
